item.title: SpikedAttention: Training-Free and Fully Spike-Driven Transformer-to-SNN Conversion with Winner-Oriented Spike Shift for Softmax Operation
item.description: SpikedAttention: Training-free transformer-to-SNN conversion achieving state-of-the-art accuracy and 42% energy reduction!
